data.title: Mitsuboshi Premier Distributor opened the brand-new website.
data.titleTh: Mitsuboshi Premier Distributor opened the brand-new website.
data.subtitle: We, AMORNYONT, are delighted to present our partner and customer a brand-new website - www.amornyont.com - as a new channel of communication. Please feel free to browse and don't hesitate to let us . . .
data.content: Use wide color to enhance the visual experience on compatible displays. Wide color displays support a P3 color space, which can produce richer, more saturated colors than sRGB. As a result, photos and videos that use wide color are more lifelike, and visual data and status indicators that use wide color are more impactful. When appropriate, use the Display P3 color profile at 16 bits per pixel (per channel) and export images in PNG format. Note that a wide color display is needed to design wide color images and select P3 colors.
